Package ohos.agp.utils

Class LayoutAlignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.utils.LayoutAlignment

  • public class LayoutAlignment
extends Object
    A utility class used to define the horizontal and vertical alignments for components.

    This class controls the alignment of a component with its parent component, for example, vertically centered or horizontally left-aligned.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int BOTTOM
      Indicates the bottom alignment for the component.
      static int CENTER
      Indicates the centered alignment for the component.
      static int END
      Indicates that the component is placed at the end edge in the X axis of the container.
      static int FILL
      Indicates vertical and horizontal fill alignment mode for the component.
      static int HORIZONTAL_CENTER
      Indicates the horizontally centered alignment for the component.
      static int HORIZONTAL_LAYOUT_ALIGNMENT_MASK
      Indicates a binary mask used to obtain a horizontal alignment type.
      static int LEFT
      Indicates the left alignment for the component.
      static int RIGHT
      Indicates the right alignment for the component.
      static int START
      Indicates that the component is placed at the start edge in the X axis of the container.
      static int TOP
      Indicates the top alignment for the component.
      static int UNSET
      Indicates that no alignment is set for the component.
      static int VERTICAL_CENTER
      Indicates the vertically centered alignment for the component.
      static int VERTICAL_LAYOUT_ALIGNMENT_MASK
      Indicates a binary mask used to obtain a vertical alignment type.
      static int X_AXIS_CROP
      Indicates horizontal crop alignment mode for the component.
      static int X_AXIS_FILL
      Indicates horizontal fill alignment mode for the component.
      static int Y_AXIS_CROP
      Indicates vertical crop alignment mode for the component.
      static int Y_AXIS_FILL
      Indicates vertical fill alignment mode for the component.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean hasHorizontalAlignment​(int layoutAlignment)
      Checks whether a given alignment type contains one of the following horizontal alignment modes: LEFT, RIGHT, HORIZONTAL_CENTER, START, END, and CENTER.
      static boolean hasVerticalAlignment​(int layoutAlignment)
      Checks whether a given alignment type contains one of the following vertical alignment modes: TOP, BOTTOM, VERTICAL_CENTER, and CENTER.

    • Method Detail

      • hasVerticalAlignment

        public static boolean hasVerticalAlignment​(int layoutAlignment)
        Checks whether a given alignment type contains one of the following vertical alignment modes: TOP, BOTTOM, VERTICAL_CENTER, and CENTER.
        Parameters:
        layoutAlignment - Indicates the given alignment type.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the given alignment type contains a vertical alignment mode; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        7

      • hasHorizontalAlignment

        public static boolean hasHorizontalAlignment​(int layoutAlignment)
        Checks whether a given alignment type contains one of the following horizontal alignment modes: LEFT, RIGHT, HORIZONTAL_CENTER, START, END, and CENTER.
        Parameters:
        layoutAlignment - Indicates the given alignment type.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the given alignment type contains a horizontal alignment mode; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        7
